description.value:
You know how to get lost in a crowd. You can use cover from crowds to Hide and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Sneak], gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures and a +4 circumstance bonus to your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures. Hidden creatures don't count as members of a crowd. If you're a master in Deception you only need 5 creatures to get these bonuses.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Face in the Crowd]
